attributes.additional_details:
Make it illegal for the Members of the Parliament and Her Majesty Government to:

1.Receive  payments and substantial gifts form the foreign governments and lobbying bodies acting on their behalf in order to  promote interest, introduce legislation and act as an agent promoting the interests of the foreign governments

2.Form the associations that will openly or indirectly promote interests of the foreign governments.

3.To be a member of the associations and groups that promote interests of the foreign governments.

Make it obligatory to declare all gifts, assets and business interests that are in direct connections with the foreign governmental bodies, associations and groups that promote interests of the foreign governments.

The register should be transparent and available for the general public.
